content.confirm_content: Are you sure you want to enable authentication? If you forget or lose the password, the energy manager has to be reset to factory defaults. See manual for details.

content.debug_report_desc_muted: complete report of all status information of this energy manager except passwords

content.factory_reset_modal_text: A factory reset will reset all configuration to their default values. This action cannot be undone! The energy manager will re-open the WiFi access point with the default SSID and passphrase from the manual. Are you sure?

script.no_info_page: Firmware file corrupted or for WARP Charger (info page missing)
script.wrong_firmware_type: Firmware file does not match the type of this energy manager

content.enable_mqtt_desc: This allows controlling the energy manager over the configured MQTT broker. MQTT API documentation

content.enable_mdns_desc: Allows other devices in this network to find the energy manager.

content.ap_hide_ssid_desc_pre: The energy manager is reachable under the BSSID
content.confirm_content: Are you sure you want to disable the WiFi Access Point? If no connection to a configured network can be established in the future, it is not possible to access the energy manager anymore.The energy manager then has to be reset to factory defaults. See manual for details.

content.charge_tracker_remove_modal_text: All tracked charges and the username history will be removed. This action cannot be undone! The energy manager then will restart.
